content.en: Arc fault detection: Researchers have been investigating how to detect different types of arc faults in electrical systems, such as in photovoltaic arrays and low-voltage AC systems. They have found that algorithms play a crucial role in identifying and detecting these faults. For example, algorithms based on higher-order cumulants, Kalman filtering, and wavelet analysis are used to differentiate between normal conditions and arc faults. These findings are important for ensuring the safety and reliability of electrical systems.
content.da: Lysbuefejldetektering: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan man kan opdage forskellige typer lysbuefejl i elektriske systemer, såsom i solcelleanlæg og lavspændings AC-systemer. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i identificeringen og detekteringen af disse fejl. For eksempel anvendes algoritmer baseret på højere-ordens kumulanter, Kalman-filtrering og wavelet-analyse til at skelne mellem normale tilstande og lysbuefejl. Disse fund er vigtige for at sikre sikkerheden og pålideligheden af elektriske systemer.
